channel.title: Why Whonix doesn't use automatic updates by default?
channel.description:
[html]

Has been asked in the forum:

https://sourceforge.net/p/whonix/discussion/general/thread/2753b89c/

A new design page has been created to answer that question:

https://whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Automatic_Updates

[/html]
